pos_sample_comments.comment: And the touch volume controls built into both controllers is an excellent addition to the versatility of the system.
The included controller is a comfortable and high quality replacement for a traditional X-Box controller, but watch that Home button.
You can set the tv at a higher volume and use the volume controls on the shield to eliminate the need for the TVs own remote.
The button is hyper sensitive and you can easily move your thumb off the toggle in a heated battle and WAMP .
For this kind of money there should be better product control.
Having a more conventional remote would be ideal, particularly since everyone knows what play, pause, volume, etc buttons do rather than having to explain to people how to work the remote.
The Home menu button i located just southwest from the toggle on the right.

sample_comments.comment: The touch pad for the volume control isn't working well most of the time.

Also, no power button!
-Buttons on controller wore out and and now stiff in under 2 months
-No flexibility, very little setting control

sample_comments.comment: - Streaming online or from hard drive, no issue at all.

usb key is not compatible to be part of the Oscar.

usb key is not compatible to be part of the Oscar.
